TopicTitle: Gold Stingray Inc. Spacecraft Division [New: Cygnus, Azure Kite, Azure Orca]

Articles.Content: If there\'s an image in your post, can\'t see it, sorry. Postin\' from school so can\'t update or see pics or whatever. By class, ie Interceptor, Scout and so on.

The KITE is an Interceptor, and the ORCA is mainly used as a Heavy Bomber.

EDIT: The picture is just of that rainbow-vomit guy, don\'t worry

Back now. Image\'s broken anyway. :b

K then, will add ships classes. Gotta be off soon.

Edit; going to leave Orca as multi-purpose, fits that role.

Dear Co-workers, I have begun production on a GS Inc. product showcase with all of our ships. Please send me your thoughts.

PS: I will only use ships on the front page.

Cheers!

Hello,

Gold Stingray\'s July 2012 Showcase is now completed!

Attached is the .pdf version, which can be opened with Adobe Reader.

Tell me what you think!

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies and Quasar Starships

Hi,

new planes 8)

The Piranha LRAG-2

(LRAG = Long Range Air to Ground.)

final approach..

Landed...

sample loadout (1 Sunbeam Laser, 2 Devastator RG, 6 Missiles)

Without weapons..

The I-103 Interceptor (+ the extended Version)

First the Standard boring version:

The 100 series of planes will all feature this 6-wing design, providing high lift and stability on the pitch axis

Now for the EV:

2 more Engines, and a little bit more fuel will make things more interesting:

It\'s also shorter than it\'s predecessor

All these planes are flyable with a keyboard, and don\'t need SAS or ASAS for lift-off.

@Luigibro: Would love to see the I-103 EV on the front page.. .

for the .craft files, PM me!

thx, Phil

Ah, hello co-workers. Plaatinum_Spark here with a hello and request. I am 83% sure that all of you are working on some sort of non-order side project! So, I would enjoy if you posted below me your current project. It will help luigi plan on what to put on the front page and also help us help each other with our Aeroplanes, Spaceplanes, and other whatnot! The sample below is my current project.

Sample: My project is the Truth Interceptor.

<Optional Picture>

The Truth Interceptor was originally designed as a centrifuge to made Jebediah Kerman tell the truth if he had been hiding on the mountains, building crazy, explosion-prone rockets. Then the Kerbin Planetwide Aerospace Administration (KPAA) decided that it was to harsh to use. So, the project was re-branded as an interceptor.

All other information is classified and only accessible by Plaatinum_Spark, Plaatinum_Nova, or Plaatinum_Quasar.

Participation not mandatory. You do not have to take a part in.

Cheers!

Plaatinum_Spark

CEO of Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies and Quasar Starships.

Project: Tweaking and perfecting the design of the Azure BALMUNG

The BALMUNG is a Pure-bred interceptor, and with speeds hitting 700m/s who can argue?

This plane is made for Hit and Run tactics, however it isn\'t quite as nimble as it\'s cousin the KITE.
Nice job, Cthulu!

Hello and good afternoon Gold Stingray Inc.

I\'d like to put an order in for a Intercontinental Plane which can take me and my fellow Pilots to the other side of Kerbin and back!*

I know what you will say... BLASFAMY!

But I believe that your fine staff of engineers can make it so so, make it so!

*Without leaving the atmosphere... Muwahahahaha

Greetings, uknut. Your order will be filed ASAP (which is like, NOW).

Thanks for choosing Gold Stingray!
